pages.title: Sage's Blessing
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 5 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Common $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Increases experience gain. $(br)Exhausts you over time

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 500 $(br2)Increases experience exponentially. $(br)No longer exhausts you
